cards.rules_text:
Skip your draw step.
Your maximum hand size is equal to Abhorrent Academic's power.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have fewer cards in your hand than your maximum hand size, draw cards equal to the difference.
Draw three cards. Discard two cards at the beginning of the next end step.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“No, this can't be right! I'm still supposed to witness the death of a loved one, I can't have a groundbreaking moral development yet!”
[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Flash
When you cast Aether Ascendant, you may have it become a copy of target instant or sorcery spell. If you do, choose new targets for it.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]Very few wizards can become truly one with their magic.
[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Deception {1}{B} ({1}{B}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)
When Aguri, Shadow of Doubt enters, target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. You lose 2 life.

Whenever one or more counters are put on a permanent you control for the first time each turn, create that many 1/1 green Squirrel creature tokens.
{1}{G}{W}, {T}: Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

Trample
When Ainok Scout enters, nourish 2, then return a creature you control to its owner's hand. (To nourish 2, either put two +1/+1 counters on this creature or create two 1/1 white Citizen creature tokens.)
Lethal damage dealt to creatures is determined by their power rather than their toughness.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]Some exoplanets seemed uninhabited at first glance. The explorers soon learned to fear them the most.
[/i]

cards.rules_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, choose two different basic land types. Create a colorless land token that's the chosen types.
At the beginning of your end step, sacrifice a land.

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +4/+4, has flying and first strike, and is an Angel in addition to its other types.
When enchanted creature dies, return Angelic Destiny to its owner's hand.

Whenever another nontoken creature you control enters, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.
{1}{G}, {T}: Populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)

When Ankulith Shard enters, draw a card.
{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

Flying
When Arbiter of Silence enters, exile all other creatures until Arbiter of Silence leaves the battlefield.
Counter target spell. If a permanent spell is countered this way, create a Gold token. (It's an artifact with “Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.”)
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“All these ruins had to throw at me were seven spike traps, five exploding runes, two nine-layer death circles and a giant hellhound? Honestly, how is this relic even still here?”
[/i]

cards.rules_text: Whenever an artifact or enchantment you control enters, Armament Scavenger gets +1/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.

Create a 1/1 colorless Construct artifact creature token. If you control six or more artifacts, create a 6/6 colorless Golem artifact creature token instead.
Draw a card.
If a nontoken creature you control would die, you may exile it instead. If you do, create two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying.

If an effect would create one or more tokens under your control, it creates twice that many of those tokens instead.
If an effect would put one or more counters on a permanent you control, it puts twice that many of those counters on that permanent instead.

When Backwoods Cultivator enters, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
When Backwoods Cultivator dies, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)
{2}{B}, Exile Barbed Cocoon from your graveyard: Create two 1/1 green Insect creature tokens. Activate only as a sorcery.
When Bauble Collector enters, you may return another permanent you control to its owner's hand.

When Bearer of Old Growth enters, choose one —
• Untap up to two target artifacts.
• Draw a card.

Bloodprice {2}{B}{B} (You may cast this card by sacrificing a creature and paying its bloodprice.)
Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. If you cast this spell for its bloodprice, return that card to the battlefield instead.

Flying
Sacrifice six Swamps: Return Berbarus Unsealed from your graveyard to the battlefield with an indestructible counter on it. You draw six cards and you lose 6 life.
Create a 3/3 green Beast creature token, then populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)
At the beginning of your end step, mill two cards. Then if ten or more cards are in your graveyard, transform Bitter Duckling.
cards.rules_text2:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, mill seven cards, then you may cast an instant or sorcery card from your graveyard. If that spell would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead.
If you would draw a card while your library has no cards in it, you win the game instead.
